welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sunbury, a charming city known for its beautiful riverside views and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that this charming destination has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, mainly used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for mainly European and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for mainly long-haul international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for mainly long-haul international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for mainly international flights operated by British Airways.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium Wi-Fi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a range of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of VIP and executive travelers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Blackbushe Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The newer and larger of the two terminals at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The original terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
